entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 in the afternoon. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 6 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
